finnish.title: Ministers by Grace
finnish.Question1: Take note of the acts of God described in this story.
finnish.Question2: What do these reveal about the character of God?
finnish.Question3: Have you experienced this dimension of the character of God in your life? If yes, how so? If not, how might you come to experience this?
finnish.Question4: What can you do to grow in your desire to know and experience God more intimately today?
